title: FS - A high end grouping of P2 Sweet Caporal Pins

posts.post_title: FS - A high end grouping of P2 Sweet Caporal Pins
posts.post_content:
For Sale - A higher end grouping of P2 Sweet Caporal Pins.  These pins have all been authenticated (see pictures) and I have subsequently removed them from their plastic holders to give you a better picture of their quality (they are no longer in their plastic sleeves).  The centering on each is near exact, images are sharp and surfaces are clean, I've also included pictures of each of their reverses.  Prices include shipping, please message if interested and thanks for looking.  Note:  NC residents please add 6.75% to any agreed upon price to cover ST.

P2 - Joe Tinker  sold

P2 - Johnny Evers sold

P2 - George Stone  sold

P2 - Harry McIntyre  sold

P2 - Red Ames  $42.50 venmo no fee or $45 pp gs

P2 - Red Murray  sold
I will take Evers and McIntyre.

[quote name="wrapperguy" post=2456090]I will take it![/QUOTE]
